bibl.title: Interpretatio del codice teodosiano in un papiro di Ginevra.
bibl.note: First edition of P. Gen. inv. lat. VI (provenance unknown, late V - first years of VI century), which constitutes evidence for juridical commentaries devoted to Codex Theodosianus.
bibl.seg: RADICIOTTI Paolo, Interpretatio del codice teodosiano in un papiro di Ginevra.
First edition of P. Gen. inv. lat. VI (provenance unknown, late V - first years of VI century), which constitutes evidence for juridical commentaries devoted to Codex Theodosianus.
